description: Photovoltaic Production by Peimar Inverter single-phase

panels.description:
Night time hourly (No production):
Daylight saving time = 21:30 - 06:00
Solar Time = 19:00 - 07:30
panels.title: Inverter Alive History

targets.query: SELECT last("tot_generated") FROM "device_status" WHERE ("tot_generated" > 0 AND "poller" =~ /^$poller$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("tot_running_time") FROM "device_status" WHERE ("tot_running_time" > 0 AND "poller" =~ /^$poller$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("today_generated") FROM "device_status" WHERE ("today_generated" >= 0 AND "poller" =~ /^$poller$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("today_running_time") FROM "device_status" WHERE ("today_running_time" >= 0 AND "poller" =~ /^$poller$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("tot_generated")  * $energy_cost FROM "device_status" WHERE ("tot_generated" > 0 AND "poller" =~ /^$poller$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("today_generated")  * $energy_cost FROM "device_status" WHERE ("today_generated" >= 0 AND "poller" =~ /^$poller$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("co2_reduction") FROM "device_status" WHERE ("co2_reduction" > 0 AND "poller" =~ /^$poller$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM alive WITH KEY=poller

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM alive WITH KEY=poller

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM alive WITH KEY=hostname WHERE poller =~ /$poller/

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM alive WITH KEY=hostname WHERE poller =~ /$poller/
